name: School is Canceled
description:
When a viral outbreak shuts down the school, 5 abandoned whiteboard drawings are left to look after their creator's self-portrait. 

Music: Onion Capers by Kevin Macleod

"Onion Capers" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
